version.note: Bug 75
IMediaPanels
(BUG-329) Partial
(FR-396) Increased font size on coverflow elements
Occasional crash on new manual call without active contact
Added trace about manual call requests
(BUG-306) Qualification is assigned to wrong contact if a new one came active while dialog is open
(BUG-303) When clicking on ready, the ready dropdown list does not close automatically
(BUG-299) The session id is sent when loading wait and pause images to avoid useless sessions creation
(BUG-288) The agent interface shows a useless second ready button
(FR-376) Language can be be read using window.external.GetSessionValue('@Language')
(BUG-262) Adjusted focus and default button on manual call dialog.
Agent messages are not broadcasted to every sup, only the one with the established chat.
Handling parameter 11 in script url (Queueid).
Sending dtmf tone impl
Support for PriorityPickup
Info panel to send DTMF tones (Sending not yet impl)
Mail pre def text are now inserted using a dubble click
mailforward window layout
All button layouts in the popups have been updated
Using the function 'UrlInsertSessionId' to build the original mail url
In the mail screen the script row is now default using 40% of the space (old value was 30%)
sometimes there is a 403 when the original mail is displayed
Queue is added to browserexternal
layout change of the buttons of the mailforward
"mailInsertText" to browserexternal funtcions: to insert a text from the script
"mailForward" to browserexternal funtcions: to forward a mail in the script
contact history now for chat and mail
Image in contact hisory for mail is incorrect
Well known destination is now used for mail to
Mail forward window redo
Known destination for manuel call is sorted
Spam button for the mail forward wasn't working
USe Microsoft.JScript.GlobalObject.unescape instead of Uri.UnescapeDataString
Application crash when chat window is still open
Qualification button can now be authorized per activity
Chat opens multiple windows
Show history command is only enabled when the activity allows it
On the recording playback panel the volume control is working now.
Translation context is updated
First release
